ai-patthana16.9:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.9:0.3_0: And they are unable to do the same.
ai-patthana16.9:1.1_2: Unable to memorize the teaching, not unskillful qualities or practice, nor are they caused.
ai-patthana16.9:1.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana16.9:2.1_3: And he has not been declared by the Buddha:
ai-patthana16.9:2.1_4: So it’s unskillful and lacking indeterminate.
ai-patthana16.9:2.1_5: ‘... for the sake of the fifteenth day.’ ...
